titles: His Majesties late protestation Before his receiving of the Sacrament.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.

At head of title: That the mouths of all Schismaticall and Seditious persons may be stopped (who endeavour to bring their Soveraigne into hatred with his people, by scandalizing his Sacred Majestie, with a purpose to alter our religion, and introduce Poperie) ...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
